- send REQUEST_SEND/REQUEST_RECEIVE actions when we start and finish experimenter API calls so that the loading overlay kicks in properly

- add the action look up by slug for 'preference-experiment'

- add an error message and popup for the case that an api call fails to alert the user

body_html:
Additional notes:

  • send REQUEST_SEND/REQUEST_RECEIVE actions when we start and finish experimenter API calls so that the loading overlay kicks in properly

  • add the action look up by slug for 'preference-experiment'
